title.narrative: NI Greater Managua Water and Sanitation (PRASMA)

description.narrative: The Project's Development Objective is to increase access to reliable* water and sanitation services to the population of the greater Managua region. *Reliable water is defined as piped potable water with adequate pressure and continuity of at least 16 hours per day, 7 days per week.

title.narrative: Piped household water connections that are benefiting from rehabilitation works undertaken by the project
1.1 Number of additional new or rehabilitated water connections in the targeted neighborhoods.
Number of additional beneficiaries with access to reliable water supply in the targeted neighborhoods.
Number of people in urban areas provided with access to Improved Water Sources under the project
1.2 Number of additional new or rehabilitated sewer connections in the targeted neighborhoods.
New household sewer connections constructed under the project
2.4 The number of illegal connections registered in participating settlements in the targeted neighborhoods.
